constituent: guest, house, each, walking legs, mouth
heisigStory: When you are a guest in a courteous town, each household has its own way of welcoming you, and each house becomes your home.
koohiiStory1: Each person under my roof is treated as a guest.
koohiiStory2: In my house I welcome each guest.
myStory: khách. mọi người đến nhà đều là khách
readingExamples: 客間 (きゃくま), 客車 (きゃくしゃ), 乗客 (じょうきゃく)
words:
客(きゃく): guest, customer
客観(きゃっかん): objective
乗客(じょうかく): passenger
旅客(りょかく): passenger (transport)
観客(かんきゃく): audience, spectator(s)
客席(きゃくせき): guest seating
客間(きゃくま): parlor, guest room
乗客(じょうきゃく): passenger
客(きゃく): guest
